Public-Self:SELF.delay:INTEGER// SDL default value is 500;
Public-Self:SELF.interval:INTEGER// SDL default velur is 30
Public-Self:SELF.enable_key_repeat (:INTEGER,:INTEGER) // Enable/Disable keyboard repeat.  Keyboard repeat defaults to off.
  is the initial delay in ms between the time when a key is
 pressed, and keyboard repeat begins.
  is the time in ms between keyboard repeat events.
 If  is set to 0, keyboard repeat is disabled.

Public-Self:SELF.previous_state:INTEGER// Previous unicode state
Public-Self:SELF.enable_unicode :INTEGER :INTEGER// Enable/Disable UNICODE translation of keyboard input.
 This translation has some overhead, so translation defaults off.
 If  is 1, translation is enabled.
 If  is 0, translation is disabled.
 If  is -1, the translation state is not changed.
 This function set the  slot

Public-Self:SELF.set_mod_state :INTEGER // Set the current key modifier state.
 This does not change the keyboard state, only the key modifier flags.
